definition.value: A book or electronic resource that lists the words of a language and gives their meaning or translation
definition.example: I'll look up “love” in the dictionary
The website gives access to an online dictionary

definition.value: A reference work on a particular subject, the items of which are typically arranged in alphabetical order
(Computing) a set of words or other text strings made for use in applications such as spelling checkers
definition.example: The worm attempts to crack account passwords using a built-in dictionary
